mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tblCamera(CameraName, ImageURL, IPAddress, RTSPString, TypeDetect, CreatedTime, UpdatedTime, StatusId) VALUE(#{cameraName}, #{imageURL}, #{ipAddress}, #{rtspString}, #{typeDetect}, convert_tz(now(),@@session.time_zone,#{createdTime}), convert_tz(now(),@@session.time_zone,#{createdTime}), #{statusId})
